amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to submit an annual report to Congress about the Agency's activities in economically disadvantaged regions and efforts to support businesses in those regions. The amendment also defines economically disadvantaged regions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to submit an annual report to Congress about the Agency's activities in economically disadvantaged regions and efforts to support businesses in those regions. The amendment also defines economically disadvantaged regions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
